QueryDefinition.Query: select cc.patid, cc.spno, cc.epikey, cc.ccstartdate, cc.ccdisdate, cc.epistart, cc.epiend, cc.admidate, cc.discharged, cc.ccstarttime, cc.ccdistime, cast(CONCAT(cast(cc.patid as varchar), cast(cc.spno as varchar)) as bigint) as visit_occurrence_id, case when cc.discharged is null or cc.discharged = '' then cc.epiend else cc.discharged end as event_date_end, CONCAT(cast(cc.patid as varchar), cast(cc.epikey as varchar)) as description FROM {sc}.critical_care cc join {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND cc.patid = ch.PERSON_ID order by cc.patid
